org.tiralab.particles

Class TreeStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tiralab.particles.TreeStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storage

    public class TreeStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Storage
    This acceleration structure stores the particles in quadtree.
